deployThisComponent

protected ApplicationServerContext deployThisComponent()
                                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                       org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
subclasses must implement this to deploy their component. It is called during sfDeploy, after we have bound to a server
